thread.title: Anita Hassanandani celebrates wedding anniversary in Kashmir
thread.title_full: Anita Hassanandani celebrates wedding anniversary in Kashmir - Entertainment

author: A Correspondent
title: Anita Hassanandani celebrates wedding anniversary in Kashmir
text:
Anita Hassanandani, who essays the role of Shagun in ‘Yeh Hai Mohabbatein’, has taken a short break from her hectic schedule. The actress is holidaying in Kashmir with her husband Rohit Reddy to celebrate their second wedding anniversary.

Anita Hassanandani with husband Rohit Reddy in Kashmir 

A sudden trip and a detox break is what she really longed for. Her husband Rohit surprised her with this vacation and told her about it only 2 days prior, keeping in mind the shoot schedule. Known for her professionalism, Anita ensured to finish her entire shoot schedule as there is major high point going on the show, given her surrogacy track.

Anita Hassanandani in Kashmir  
Currently playing a role reversal in her show, Anita is seen playing a surrogate mother to Raman (Karan Patel) and Ishita’s (Divyanka Tripathi) child. Playing a positive role for a change, Anita’s character has gone through shades of grey since the beginning of the show.

Anita Hassanandani with husband Rohit Reddy in Kashmir 

Anita Hassanandani married businessman Rohit Reddy in Goa on October 14, 2013.
